    • Class panels.GamePanel

      class GamePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      123455L

      • Serialized Fields

        • addingTime
          boolean addingTime
          Keeps track of if time is being added or not. If this is set to true, the addText string is displayed on the screen.
        • addText
          String addText
          Text displayed when adding time.
        • addTextX
          int addTextX
          X coord for adding time text.
        • addTextY
          int addTextY
          Y coord for adding time text.
        • addTimeElapsed
          int addTimeElapsed
          How long addText has been displayed for.
        • attack
          AudioPlayer attack
          Audio player for when the player attacks
        • backgroundImage
          Image backgroundImage
          Background image.
        • cmanager
          ChunkManager cmanager
          ChunkManager object.
        • customFont
          Font customFont
          Create a custom font with size 20, used for writing the time left and enemies killed.
        • death
          AudioPlayer death
          Audio player for when the player dies
        • deathAnimation
          boolean deathAnimation
          When deathAnimation is true, we are animating the player's death.
        • DEATHANIMATIONTIME
          int DEATHANIMATIONTIME
          How many frames will pass from the start of the death animation to the end.
        • deathCount
          int deathCount
          deathCount keeps track of the how many frames we have drawn since the start of the death animation.
        • deathPlayedOnce
          boolean deathPlayedOnce
          Tells us if the death audio has already played once
        • deltas
          Map<GameVariables.Facing,Integer[]> deltas
          deltas holds the distance that would be moved in each direction based on the player's speed.
        • enemyKillCountX
          int enemyKillCountX
          Enemy Kill count text x coord.
        • enemyKillCountY
          int enemyKillCountY
          Enemy Kill count text y coord.
        • fpsTracker
          List<Integer> fpsTracker
          ArrayList used to track average fps.
        • gameThread
          Thread gameThread
          Thread used for our game
        • healthBarHeight
          int healthBarHeight
          Reduce the height of the health bar.
        • healthBarWidth
          int healthBarWidth
          Make the health bar width slightly smaller than the panel width.
        • healthLoop
          float healthLoop
          Keeps track of loop times so we can add less health when the player reaches level 3
        • hit
          AudioPlayer hit
          Audio player for when the player hits and enemy
        • keyH
          KeyHandler keyH
          KeyHandler object used to detect key presses/releases.
        • levelUp
          AudioPlayer levelUp
          Audio player for when the player completes a level
        • levelVersionNumber
          int levelVersionNumber
          Version of the current level, each level has 5 versions.
        • maxAddTime
          int maxAddTime
          How long to display addText.
        • moreTime
          AudioPlayer moreTime
          Audio player for when the player kills an enemy and get additional time
        • moving
          AudioPlayer moving
          Audio player for the sound of the player walking
        • NUM_LEVELS
          int NUM_LEVELS
          Number of levels in game.
        • padding
          int padding
          Padding from the top and right edges of the panel.
        • playedOnce
          boolean playedOnce
          Tells us if the moreTime audio has already played once
        • random
          Random random
          Random object, used for generating which level version to use.
        • speed
          int speed
          Speed of player.
        • timeX
          int timeX
          Time left text x coord.
        • timeY
          int timeY
          Time left text y coord.
        • v
          Visibility v
          Visibility object, used to change visibility as time goes on.

      • Serialized Fields

          The player currently being displayed on the home screen.

          The clicked image for the left facing button

          The default image for the left facing button
        • leftButtonHover
          ImageIcon leftButtonHover
          The mouse hover image for the left facing button
        • nameField
          JTextField nameField
          Text field used to store players name.
        • rightButtonClick
          ImageIcon rightButtonClick
          The clicked image for the right facing button
        • rightButtonDefault
          ImageIcon rightButtonDefault
          The default image for the right facing button
        • rightButtonHover
          ImageIcon rightButtonHover
          The mouse hover image for the right facing button
        • timer
          Timer timer
          This timer will control the redrawing of the player.
